name: CalorieFinder
0:
”Alexa open calorie finder”
”Alexa, start calorie finder”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: calorie finder
des:
The calorie finder skill will help you quickly check the total calories in commonly consumed foods and drinks. The data is sourced from the USDA Food and Nutrition Service and optimized for voice interaction. 
The website for the source data is https://catalog.data.gov/dataset/mypyramid-food-raw-data-f9ed6
You can say ‘Alexa, open calorie finder’ to get started, or directly ask a question like – ‘Alexa, ask calorie finder how many calories are in an apple’.
Once started, calorie finder continues the conversation and finds total calories for as many item as you want. Just keep asking one at a time, and it will find the answers for you. You can also ask the skill to repeat the last answer.
This is the first version of the skill. Your feedback and comments will help us improve.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
